price: Kõ kuma sun riƙi mãsu cẽto ne, waɗansun Allah? Ka ce: "Shin, kuma kõ dã sun kasance bã su da mallakar kõme, kuma bã su hankalta?"
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ شُفَعَآءَۚ قُلۡ أَوَلَوۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadhū min dūni al-lahi shufaʿāa qul awalaw kānū lā yamlikūna shayan walā yaʿqilūna
